p: We observed a reduction in the Cdk2 in cells exposed to 5-Brd-2′-dU (0.36 ± 0.09) (2.7 X) and non-significant variation at the mRNA level (1.09 ± 0.09) ( Figure 5g); however, at the protein level, we found changes for cells exposed to L-Tyr ( Figure 5h,i). A set of miRNAs with regulatory potential for each type of treatment from the coincidences reported for Ccdn1 and Cdk4, except for miR-149-5p.
